title: Analyze particle motion from velocity part - c

content.description: A particle moves along the y-axis so that its velocity at any time t ≥ 0 is given by v(t)=t cos t . At time t =0 , the position of the particle is y = 3 .
content.question: Write an expression for the position y(t) of the particle.

frqParts.text: Write an expression for the position y(t) of the particle.

topic.text: 6.11: (BC ONLY) Integrating Using Integration by Parts

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
